Q. 1. Describe any three main features of Two-Party system. [Board Term-II, Term-II, Foreign Set-III 2015]
answers: Ans. Main features of two-party system :  Power usually changes between two parties, several other parties may exist.  In such system, people get clear choice.  The party that wins majority forms the government and the other sits in opposition.  Strong opposition is good for democracy.  Prompt decisions are taken and implemented.
